Description: You are looking at a Danelectro Hodad Guitar with Bigsby style trem is a white (creamy) pearl. Really cool tones with the split coil pots and the middle position "out of phase setting. The guitar in very good, used condition. The color looks different depending on the angle and the light. A few nicks in the finish and one in the neck by the headstock (see photo, very small). I tried to take pictures of the spots. The guitar has some very slight side tape separation around the curves but overall excellent condition. Reissued with the vintage look, sound, and feel of the early Danelectro's. The guitar plays great! No case or gig bag included. "The Hodad... Undoubtedly 'The Kingdaddy of Retro' and The Ultimate Surf Guitar! This Hodad guitar comes with (4) Lipstick Tube style pickups (with original formula 50's style Alnico magnet) wired like 2 humbuckers, Pull-on tone knobs for out~of~phase and coil-tap on each pickup set for 12 totally cool tone variations, Dual Tone and Volume Controls, a Hard Maple Neck with Rosewood Fingerboard, Fully Adjustable Bridge with Individual String Intonation Adjustments and smooth Gotoh tuners." 2 Lipstick® Humbucker pairs. Pull knob switches for coil tap and phase reverse. Awesome tone! Double cutaway offset horn shapeScale length: 25″Number of frets: 21Fully adjustable bridge with bigsby style trem2 dual humbucking lipstick® pickups2 volume controls2 tone controls (with push pull switches for coil tap and out of phase)3 way pickup selector All sales are finalPaypal only! No International bids or shipping.
Title: Danelectro Hodad - Made In Korea - W/ Bigsby -RARE cream binding Electric Guitar
